hero.title: Strategy born from knowledge and growing through connections.
hero.subtitle: Strategic consultancy specialized in the Food Industry.

about.title: 25 years navigating the Food Industry
about.subtitle: About Us
about.paragraph1: At Thalassa Hub, we believe that food safety works best when understood from a business perspective.
about.paragraph2: Susana Serna, founder and CEO, is a Food Industry Engineer with over 25 years of experience in international organizations, working with companies across the entire food supply chain: from primary production to industry, retail, and the HORECA channel.
about.paragraph3: This cross-cutting vision has allowed her to understand first-hand the challenges and opportunities of each link in the chain and to help organizations not only comply but also consolidate their brands and expand, turning regulatory requirements and customer demands into real differentiation opportunities.
about.paragraph4: Thalassa Hub relies on a network of senior collaborators, professionals with extensive experience and deep sector knowledge, who share the same approach to food safety: with judgment, experience, and practical sense.
about.quote: "We go beyond requirements. We turn complexity into judgment, focus, and clear decisions."

services.title: One Hub. Three lines. One same approach.

object.title: Website purpose:
object.text: This website aims to inform about the services of Thalassa Hub S.L, specialized in consultancy for Food Industry companies, and to facilitate contact and booking of professional meetings.
